data.actual_result: Giphy continues to try to load gifs.
data.expected_result: Giphy should no longer try to load gifs.
data.short_description: When you cancel a giphy search it does not stop searching.
data.steps_to_repro: - Simulate a slow connection(10mbit) - Do multiple  queries. - Watch Discord continue downloading all the giphy's you've searched for despite not having the search window open anymore. (submitting this on behalf of a user)
